00021 #ifndef _CELConversionUtilities_HEADER_
00022 #define _CELConversionUtilities_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! file CELConversionUtilities.h This file contains utilities needed for converting CEL file formats. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConversionOptions.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CELData.h"
00028 //
00029 #include "file/CELFileData.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <string>
00033 //
00034 
00035 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00036 {
00037 
00038 /*! This class will convert a CEL file from GCOS to Calvin format. */
00039 class CELConversionUtilities
00040 {
00041 public:
00042 
00043         /*! Gets the grid coordinates from the calvin data object.
00044          * @param inFile The Calvin CEL file object.
00045          * @return The grid coordinates.
00046          */
00047         static GridCoordinatesType GetGrid(affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData &inFile);
00048 
00049         /*! Gets the Dat header from the calvin data object.
00050          * @param inFile The Calvin CEL file object.
00051          * @return The Dat header string.
00052         */
00053         static std::string GetDatHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData &inFile);
00054 
00055         /*! Copies the calvin object to the GCOS object.
00056          * @param inFile The Calvin CEL file object.
00057          * @param outFile The GCOS CEL file object.
00058         */
00059         static bool Copy(affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData &inFile, affxcel::CCELFileData &outFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00060 
00061         /*! Copies a GCOS CEL object to another GCOS CEL object.
00062          * @param inFile The GCOS CEL file object to copy.
00063          * @param outFile The resulting GCOS CEL file object.
00064          */
00065         static bool Copy(affxcel::CCELFileData &inFile, affxcel::CCELFileData &outFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00066 
00067         /*! Sets the cell margin in the outFile.  It converts the parameter is required.
00068          *      @param inFile The GCOS CEL file holding the CellMargin value.
00069          *      @param outFile The GCOS CEL file object to which the cell margin is set.
00070          *      @param defaultValue The cell margin value to write if the value is not found in inFile.
00071          */
00072         static void SetCellMargin(affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData &inFile, affxcel::CCELFileData &outFile, int defaultValue);
00073 
00074         /*! Finds the algorithm parameter value in the inFile and sets the value to the outFile algorithm parameters.
00075          *      If the value is not found in inFile, then the default value is written to the outFile.
00076          *      @param name The name of the parameter to find in the inFile.
00077          *      @param defaultValue The value to use if the parameter is not found in inFile.
00078          *      @param inFile The Calvin CEL file ojbect.
00079          *      @param outFile The resulting GCOS CEL object.
00080          */
00081         static void FindAndAddAlgorithmParameter(std::string name, std::string defaultValue, affymetrix_calvin_io::CelFileData &inFile, affxcel::CCELFileData &outFile);
00082 
00083 
00084 };
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 #endif
